summary.span: 用于执行开放属性的后期绑定操作。

span.span: Used to perform late-bound operations on open properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当实现 WCF Data Services 的自定义数据服务提供程序时，将使用此类。This class is used when you implement a custom data service provider for WCF Data Services.

related.span: 数据服务提供程序（WCF 数据服务）

span.span: Data Services Providers (WCF Data Services)
